Meggitt Sensing Systems - About the company

What does Meggitt Sensing Systems do?

Meggitt Sensing Systems designs and develops sensing, monitoring and control devices for operation under harsh and demanding situations. The sensing solutions are organized in product lines (brands) such as: Endevco, Sensorex, Wilconxon Research, Vibro-meter and Ferroperm Piezoceramics. Some of the areas in which the companies products are applied are: aviation, machine monitoring, motion sensing etc. Meggitt Sensing Systems operates as a part of Meggitt PLC (Public), which is a large engineering group.

Which sectors and market segments does Meggitt Sensing Systems operate in?

Meggitt Sensing Systems serves in the B2B space in the Semiconductors market segments.

The primary business model of Meggitt Sensing Systems is :Semiconductors > Sensors > ***** **** > ***** ******

Meggitt Sensing Systems's IPO details

Meggitt Sensing Systems got listed on London Stock Exchange ( LSE ) on Apr 28, 1947.

Who is the current CEO of Meggitt Sensing Systems?

Meggitt Sensing Systems's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of Meggitt Sensing Systems

Meggitt Sensing Systems ranks 49 th among 154 competitors which include XYMA Analytics, Asystom and Mikros Systems. 11 of its competitors are funded while 13 have exited. Overall, Meggitt Sensing Systems and its competitors have raised over $22.3M in funding across 28 funding rounds involving 48 investors. There are 5 public and 8 acquired companies in the entire competition set.
